5-4-3-2-1.title: 5-4-3-2-1 Grounding
5-4-3-2-1.description: This technique helps bring you back to the present moment during anxiety or panic. Identify: 5 things you can see, 4 things you can touch, 3 things you can hear, 2 things you can smell, and 1 thing you can taste.
steps: Look around and name 5 visible objects
Notice 4 things you can physically touch

60-seconds.title: 60-Second Reset
60-seconds.description: A quick reset for when you feel overwhelmed. This simple technique can help you regain focus and calm.
steps: Drink a glass of water slowly
Return to your task with fresh focus

progressive.title: Progressive Relaxation
progressive.description: Systematically tense and relax muscle groups to release physical tension and promote relaxation.
steps: Tighten your hands for 5 seconds, then release
Tighten your arms for 5 seconds, then release
Tighten your shoulders for 5 seconds, then release
Work your way down your entire body
Notice the difference between tension and relaxation
